name: Turner (itch)
description:
This is a Plat-Former Game.

 Regarding the theme "Out of Place".

I finished the game in 1 day so there might be some things you  don't like but pls forgive me. 

This is also my first game jam to be completed.

And also Thanks to Deynum for making this jam. And also to vimlark to tell the theme.
